Posts.EditableText:
What I have been doing lately when I'm not working, going to school, taking care of my family, or designing Quest games:

I don't really need to advertise this because they have so many people joined up that there are over 1,000 people logged in at any given time.

But anyway, it's strangely addicting.  It's basically a text game but there are some hand drawn graphics.  There are attributes that you build as you fight enemies.  So....like an RPG.

It's very funnily written though.  Your money is "meat".  As you fight, you can gain "magicalness" and "fortitude".  When you start, you choose a type of character such as a "seal clubber" or an "accordian thief".

It's crazy....

Try it out...  [url:2xegi0yv]http://www.kingdomofloathing.com[/url:2xegi0yv]
Posts.HTML:
What I have been doing lately when I'm not working, going to school, taking care of my family, or designing Quest games:

I don't really need to advertise this because they have so many people joined up that there are over 1,000 people logged in at any given time.

But anyway, it's strangely addicting. It's basically a text game but there are some hand drawn graphics. There are attributes that you build as you fight enemies. So....like an RPG.

It's very funnily written though. Your money is "meat". As you fight, you can gain "magicalness" and "fortitude". When you start, you choose a type of character such as a "seal clubber" or an "accordian thief".

It's crazy....

Try it out... http://www.kingdomofloathing.com
